title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Flipped Learning for Continuing Medical Education (CME) Teaching Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners complete pre-learning materials at 80% or higher in a flipped learning environment to ensure readiness for class participation
Learners apply flipped learning theories to three or more real clinical scenarios through PBL workshops
Learners improve their perception of flipped learning effectiveness from 3.5 to 4.0 or higher (5-point scale) through formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
